document.full_text: oil prices bounced back on friday from a torrid 10 percent slide the previous session, as shellshocked traders mulled market fundamentals and the frenzy this week that wiped out half the year's gains.
document.title: oil rebounds after 10 percent drop
lines_and_colors: oil prices bounced back on friday from a torrid 10 percent slide the previous session, as shellshocked traders mulled market fundamentals and the frenzy this week that wiped out half the year's gains.
